title: Praying in a masjid where they have Allah & Muhammad written next to each other - Assim al hakeem
transcript: belgium he says what's the ruling on praying in a masjid where they have allah named in a circle and next to it muhammad rasulullah in a circle the prayer is valid totally it has nothing to do with the prayer what counts is the akhida of the imam himself whether he's committing shirk or not but praying there is totally legit you
